org.apache.poi.util

Class LittleEndian

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.util.LittleEndian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LittleEndianConsts 

    @Internal
public final class LittleEndian
extends java.lang.Object
implements LittleEndianConsts
    a utility class for handling little-endian numbers, which the 80x86 world is replete with. The methods are all static, and input/output is from/to byte arrays, or from InputStreams.(一个用于处理小端数字的实用程序类，80 x86世界中充满了这些数字。这些方法都是静态的，输入/输出是来自/到字节数组，或来自InputStreams。)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LittleEndian.BufferUnderrunException
      Exception to handle buffer underruns(处理缓冲区欠载运行时异常)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.poi.util.LittleEndianConsts

        BYTE_SIZE, DOUBLE_SIZE, INT_SIZE, LONG_SIZE, SHORT_SIZE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double getDouble(byte[] data)
      get a double value from a byte array, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java double(从字节数组中获取一个double值，以小端格式读取它，然后将结果转换为令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数，以获得一个快乐的java double)
      static double getDouble(byte[] data, int offset)
      get a double value from a byte array, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java double(从字节数组中获取一个double值，以小端格式读取它，然后将结果转换为令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数，以获得一个快乐的java double)
      static float getFloat(byte[] data)
      get a float value from a byte array, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java float(从字节数组中获取浮点值，以小字节序格式读取它，然后将生成的令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数转换为快乐的Java浮点数)
      static float getFloat(byte[] data, int offset)
      get a float value from a byte array, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java float(从字节数组中获取浮点值，以小字节序格式读取它，然后将生成的令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数转换为快乐的Java浮点数)

    • Method Detail

      • getDouble

        public static double getDouble(byte[] data)
        get a double value from a byte array, reads it in little endian format then converts the resulting revolting IEEE 754 (curse them) floating point number to a happy java double(从字节数组中获取一个double值，以小端格式读取它，然后将结果转换为令人反感的IEEE 754（诅咒他们）浮点数，以获得一个快乐的java double)
        Parameters:
        data - the byte array(数据-字节数组)
        Returns:
        the double (64-bit) value(双倍（64位）值)

      • getDouble

        public static double getDouble(byte[] data,
                               int offset)

        Parameters:
        data - the byte array(数据-字节数组)
        offset - a starting offset into the byte array(Offset -字节数组的开始偏差)
        Returns:
        the double (64-bit) value(双倍（64位）值)

      • getShortArray

        public static short[] getShortArray(byte[] data,
                                    int offset,
                                    int size)
        Read short array(读取短数组)
        Parameters:
        data - the original byte array(data -原始字节数组)
        offset - Where to start copying from.(offset -开始复制的位置。)
        size - Number of bytes to copy.(size -要复制的字节数。)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - - if read would cause access of data outside array bounds.(java.lang. IndexOutOfBoundsResponse- -如果读取会导致访问数组边界之外的数据。)

      • putByte

        public static void putByte(byte[] data,
                           int offset,
                           int value)
        executes:

        data[offset] = (byte)value;

        Added for consistency with other put~() methods        (执行：数据[Offset] =（字节）值;添加以与其他put~（）方法一致)

      • readInt

        public static int readInt(java.io.InputStream stream)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        get an int value from an InputStream(从InputStream获取int值)
        Parameters:
        stream - the InputStream from which the int is to be read(stream -从中读取int的InputStream)
        Returns:
        the int (32-bit) value(int（32位）值)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - will be propagated back to the caller(java.io. IOResponse-将传播回调用者)
        LittleEndian.BufferUnderrunException - if the stream cannot provide enough bytes(LittleEndian. BufferUnderrun异常-如果流无法提供足够的字节)

      • readUInt

        public static long readUInt(java.io.InputStream stream)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        get an unsigned int value from an InputStream(从InputStream获取无符号int值)
        Parameters:
        stream - the InputStream from which the int is to be read(stream -从中读取int的InputStream)
        Returns:
        the unsigned int (32-bit) value(unsigned int（32位）值)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - will be propagated back to the caller(java.io. IOResponse-将传播回调用者)
        LittleEndian.BufferUnderrunException - if the stream cannot provide enough bytes(LittleEndian. BufferUnderrun异常-如果流无法提供足够的字节)

        get a long value from an InputStream(从InputStream获取长期值)
        Parameters:
        stream - the InputStream from which the long is to be read(stream -要从中读取长字符的InputStream)
        Returns:
        the long (64-bit) value(长（64位）值)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - will be propagated back to the caller(java.io. IOResponse-将传播回调用者)
        LittleEndian.BufferUnderrunException - if the stream cannot provide enough bytes(LittleEndian. BufferUnderrun异常-如果流无法提供足够的字节)

      • readShort

        public static short readShort(java.io.InputStream stream)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        get a short value from an InputStream(从InputStream获取空头值)
        Parameters:
        stream - the InputStream from which the short is to be read(stream -要从中读取short的InputStream)
        Returns:
        the short (16-bit) value(短（16位）值)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - will be propagated back to the caller(java.io. IOResponse-将传播回调用者)
        LittleEndian.BufferUnderrunException - if the stream cannot provide enough bytes(LittleEndian. BufferUnderrun异常-如果流无法提供足够的字节)

      • readUShort

        public static int readUShort(java.io.InputStream stream)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException(java.io.IOException)

      • ubyteToInt

        public static int ubyteToInt(byte b)
        Convert an 'unsigned' byte to an integer. ie, don't carry across the sign.(将“无符号”字节转换为integer。即，不要携带标志。)
        Parameters:
        b - Description of the Parameter(b -参数描述)
        Returns:
        Description of the Return Value(返回值的描述)
